TopicTitle: Generic new to forum post, Hi.

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, new to the forum, played KSP for a while now, got it on early access aggeesss ago.

From the UK originally North West but now im around southampton for study.

Just here to have a laugh and talk about this game which i waste so many hours on.

Hello Evildoctorgraves, and welcome to the forum!

This is an excellent place to have a laugh and discuss our favourite game.  We are a very international community with members from all over the planet.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
